body_html:
@karmel I.e. one user case:

  • Design a tf.keras model
  • Convert that to estimator
  • train_and_evaluate with automarted model saving from scratch
  • Than you want to bootstrap again a different fork of the model with quite the same code from some checkpoint of the previous one.
body_text:
@karmel I.e. one user case:

Design a tf.keras model
Convert that to estimator
train_and_evaluate with automarted model saving from scratch
Than you want to bootstrap again a different fork of the model with quite the same code from some checkpoint of the previous one.
body:
@karmel I.e. one user case:

- Design a tf.keras model
- Convert that to estimator
- `train_and_evaluate` with automarted model saving from scratch
- Than you want to bootstrap again a different fork of the model with quite the same code from some checkpoint of the previous one.
